Player History
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 5/13/1985 with a Bruised Ribs, out for one week...
Traded from St. Louis to Chicago on 5/18/1986 (Going to STL: P Frank Viola. Going to CHC: P Bert Blyleven, P Jeff Fassero, 2B Luis Alicea, CF Lance Johnson)...
Injured on 5/1/1987 with a Bruised Ankle, out for one week...
Injured on 9/1/1988 with a Bruised Foot, out for 6 days...
Injured on 8/19/1989 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/4/1989, off Mike Bielecki (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/7/1989, off Shawn Hillegas (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/26/1989, off Mike Scott (PIT)...
Drove in 6 runs against Montreal on 7/24/1990...
2/2/1992: Gets a new one-year contract worth $364,286 through salary arbitration...
